alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Northern Marinette County; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 8:31PM CST until January 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW OVERSPREADING THE AREA TONIGHT, THEN WINDY WITH PERIODS OF SNOW ON WEDNESDAY... .A strengthening low pressure system will slowly track across the area tonight and Wednesday morning, then shift into northern Lower Michigan Wednesday afternoon. Snow from the system will overspread the area tonight and continue into Wednesday. Winds will also increase considerably on Wednesday, resulting in some blowing and drifting snow and reduced visibility. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will likely become hazardous. Blowing and drifting snow could reduce the visibility in open areas on Wednesday afternoon. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning and afternoon commutes.
info.instruction: Plan on slower than normal travel conditions and be sure to check the latest weather and road conditions before heading out on the roads. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
